languages.text: Священная реликвия, которая была дарована династии фон Валанциус в знак особого доверия Эклезиархии.
This sacred relic was gifted to House von Valancius as a sign of the Ecclesiarchy's rare trust.
languages.original_text: Священная реликвия, которая была дарована династии фон Валанциус в знак особого доверия Эклезиархии.

traits.locale_text: This sacred relic was gifted to House von Valancius as a sign of the Ecclesiarchy's rare trust.
This sacred relic was gifted to House von Valancius as a sign of the Ecclesiarchy's rare trust.
This sacred relic was gifted to House von Valancius as a sign of the Ecclesiarchy's rare trust.
This sacred relic was gifted to House von Valancius as a sign of the Ecclesiarchy's rare trust.
This sacred relic was gifted to House von Valancius as a sign of the Ecclesiarchy's rare trust.

languages.text: 这件圣物是国教赠送给冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的礼物，作为信任的象征，很少有人能获得这样的殊荣。
languages.original_text: This sacred relic was gifted to House von Valancius as a sign of the Ecclesiarchy's rare trust.

traits.locale_text: 这件圣物是国教赠送给冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的礼物，作为信任的象征，很少有人能获得这样的殊荣。

languages.text: Dieses heilige Relikt wurde dem Haus Valancius als Zeichen des seltenen Vertrauens der Ekklesiarchie geschenkt.
languages.original_text: This sacred relic was gifted to House von Valancius as a sign of the Ecclesiarchy's rare trust.

traits.locale_text: Dieses heilige Relikt wurde dem Haus Valancius als Zeichen des seltenen Vertrauens der Ekklesiarchie geschenkt.

languages.text: La maison von Valancius a reçu cette relique sacrée en témoignage de la confiance que lui accorde l'Ecclésiarchie.
languages.original_text: This sacred relic was gifted to House von Valancius as a sign of the Ecclesiarchy's rare trust.

traits.locale_text: La maison von Valancius a reçu cette relique sacrée en témoignage de la confiance que lui accorde l'Ecclésiarchie.

languages.text: Esta reliquia sagrada fue confiada a la casa von Valancius como muestra de la confianza de la Eclesiarquía, un hecho nada común.
languages.original_text: This sacred relic was gifted to House von Valancius as a sign of the Ecclesiarchy's rare trust.

traits.locale_text: Esta reliquia sagrada fue confiada a la casa von Valancius como muestra de la confianza de la Eclesiarquía, un hecho nada común.

languages.text: この神聖なる遺物は、帝国聖教会の希少な信頼の証としてフォン・ヴァランシウス家に贈られた。
languages.original_text: This sacred relic was gifted to House von Valancius as a sign of the Ecclesiarchy's rare trust.

traits.locale_text: この神聖なる遺物は、帝国聖教会の希少な信頼の証としてフォン・ヴァランシウス家に贈られた。

languages.text: Kutsal yadigâr, Ekleşiarşi'nin çok ender bahşedilen güveninin bir ifadesi olarak von Valancius Hanesi'ne hediye edilmişti.
languages.original_text: This sacred relic was gifted to House von Valancius as a sign of the Ecclesiarchy's rare trust.
